title: Bloomberg Markets: Hartman Says Market Rewarding Growth
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Hartman Says Market Rewarding Growth
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Kirk D Hartman Global Chief Investment Officer Wells Fargo Asset Management Discussing the markets and investing on so-called "mega-tech" stocks like Facebook.
